page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE AT HOWNAM
page.content: I am a 16-year old schoolgirl.I live on a farm near Hownam in the Scottish Borders with my parents and 3 younger sisters.Through the week I get up at 6.45a.m. and go out to put my horse into the field. At 7:15 I have my breakfast and leave for school at 8 o'clock.The bus arrives around 10 past and I get to Kelso High School at 20 to 9. School starts at 8:55 and finishes at 3:45. I have a morning break and buy my lunch at the school cafeteria.My timetable consists of mathematics,english,geography,biology and accountancy. I arrive home at 20 past 4 and I have my evening meal at 5. After that I catch my horse and take him for a ride which lasts about an hour,and then I stable him for the night.I next do any home work that I have, and then watch television or read until its time for bed.
